name: Divide (itch) (CoolCat7)
description:
Welcome to virtual laboratory where you can divide, feed small cells.

You have to perform various tasks related to cells, and you can also do various experiments yourself :)

Input:

  • 'Enter' - quit to menu.

Music: https://www.newgrounds.com/audio/listen/551781 

I made this game for Weekly Game Jam - Week 219.

Theme: Evolution.
